snippet: George Zimmerman, the Florida man who fatally shot an unarmed Florida teenager in February, has set up a Web site to speak to supporters - and ask for money.
abstract: George Zimmerman, the Florida man who fatally shot an unarmed Florida teenager in February, has set up a Web site to speak to supporters - and ask for money.

byline.original: By CHANNING JOSEPH and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: On a New Web Site, 'The Real George Zimmerman' Speaks, and Solicits Funds
